member.name: T:Scoreloop.CoreSocial.API.WebBrowserExtensions.WindowsWebBrowser
member.summary: Wrapper class for standard WebBrowser control.

member.name: M:Scoreloop.CoreSocial.API.WebBrowserExtensions.WindowsWebBrowser.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Verifies if given object is a WebBrowser control.

member.name: M:Scoreloop.CoreSocial.API.WebBrowserExtensions.WindowsWebBrowser.NavigateTo(System.String)
member.summary: Requests navigation to given URL. Different threads might try to call it, so internally it should switch to UI-thread if required.

member.name: E:Scoreloop.CoreSocial.API.WebBrowserExtensions.WindowsWebBrowser.Navigated
member.summary: Event fired each time web browser navigated to any page (especially the one requested by call to Navigate() method).

member.name: P:Scoreloop.CoreSocial.API.WebBrowserExtensions.WindowsWebBrowser.Object
member.summary: Native web control object. This value is returned by the social providers related Scoreloop API.
